HomePage.labInfo: Laboratories are practical platforms where students work on real tasks and learn from experts. It’s your chance to take the first step in your career, explore different fields, and build a strong portfolio.

AIInstitute.whoWeAre: Who we are: a team of experts and practitioners
AIInstitute.desc: We bring together specialists from leading tech and consulting companies to implement AI and digital solutions in business, education, and the public sector.
AIInstitute.practiceDesc: Learning and implementation go hand in hand.
AIInstitute.projectDesc: Every solution is tested on real-world cases.
AIInstitute.partnershipDesc: We collaborate with the largest companies in Central Asia.

Products.desc1: RG Gold — automation of geodata and factory management.
Products.desc3: KazTransOil — chatbot, training, and AI system setup.
Products.desc4: Digital University & OquLabs — digital platform and student monitoring.

Potentials.desc1: AI and ML in industry, education, and public administration.
Potentials.desc2: IoT solutions for healthcare and infrastructure.

LaboratoriesPage.labDesc: Join student laboratories — from investments and AI to superforecasting and business analytics. Gain experience you won’t find in textbooks.
LaboratoriesPage.formatItem1Desc: If you complete a complex project
LaboratoriesPage.formatItem2Desc: If you complete a complex project
LaboratoriesPage.faqItem1Desc: No, motivation and willingness to learn are what matter.
LaboratoriesPage.faqItem2Title: How long does the training take?
LaboratoriesPage.faqItem3Desc: Yes, but you’ll need to pass selection for each one.
LaboratoriesPage.faqItem4Title: What will I get in the end?
LaboratoriesPage.faqItem4Desc: A project portfolio, real skills, and a certificate.
